Posts.Content: Nov 6, 2018 12:51AM BbyPop wrote: I really hope it’s just a skin problems. I have always had issues with tiny hairs on my breasts leaving small marks almost like mini ingrowns? But now theres strange purple discoloration under the skin. About an hour ago it’s was pretty dark and larger now its not covering as much and lighter. It’s on and off but always there
Posts.Title: Purple splotches, young and fat, IBC?? BbyPop BbyPop

Posts.Content: Nov 6, 2018 06:04PM BbyPop wrote: Okay so today I went to the local breast center where they did an ultrasound on both breasts. They said all they found was fluid under the skin and they think I have a skin infection and to see a dermatologist. They refused to biopsy me even after hearing my concern about IBC. I asked if they have seen IBC before and they told me "thousands of times" which was strange to me since it's rare. They told me they would be able to tell if I had IBC on the ultrasound and just didn't seem very educated about IBC. Telling me that no one gets misdiagnosed for skin infection with IBC because it's easy to spot. Made an appointment with a dermatologist for Thursday where I will be asking for a skin punch biopsy just to rule out IBC. I really do hope this is just a skin issue but I do not feel comfortable with playing the waiting game with my breasts looking like this. Thanks for listening - will continue to do updates.
Posts.Title: Purple splotches, young and fat, IBC?? BbyPop BbyPop

Purple splotches, young and fat, IBC?? BbyPop BbyPop

Posts.Content: BbyPop wrote: Okay so I'm 22 married with 3 kids (2 step one biological). I'm morbidly obese. E cup breasts. I'm worried about IBC. Symptoms: Purple splotches on both breasts, peau d'orange skin on both breasts, occasional sharp pain in breasts, pain in right armpit, neck, elbow and hand pain. Last weekend I was using the restroom when I stood up and looked in the mirror my top had slipped down and reveled two BRIGHT purple splotches on both of my breasts on the side next to my nipple and in between my cleavege. About two inches big on my right side and an inch and a half on my left. I ran and showed my husband freaking out and we googled of course seen IBC or mastitis. I pumped for 3 weeks after my daughter was born March of 2017 and that was all. Almost got mastitis and it was red and painful lump. Eventually got it to go away with hot compresses and massaging. What I am experiencing now is nothing like that. I went and seen the nurse practitioner last Monday, didn't have much to say other then didn't feel any lumps. Referred me to a local breast center for a diagnostic eval. Tomorrow 11/6. It's been a little over a week since I noticed the purple splotches and peau d'orange skin. Since then I have gotten a constant pain in my neck, armpit, shoulder, elbow and hand. I noticed that sometimes when I am sitting it makes me splotches a darker color and then when I get up and walk around they become slightly lighter. I had a cancer scare earlier this year for a tumor that was found on my liver, did an MRI and determined it was benign. I am just so worried about my breasts. I'm so worried for my family I am the "rock" in the family. Gonna be doing updates. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Purple splotches, young and fat, IBC?? BbyPop BbyPop

Posts.Content: Nov 9, 2018 03:11AM BbyPop wrote: okay seen the dermatologist today and they said it’s “Keratosis Pilaris”. Gave me a cream (cortisone) and told me to use aquaphor. I am just not comfortable with this diagnosis alone and still want a biopsy. She told me they are easy for her to do but didn’t think I needed one since she’s *knows* what I have. I agreed. I tried to feel confident with that diagnosis but I’m just not. I’m worried sick at this point and I’m starting to get lots of tiny sharp pains deep in my chest as well as slight very slight burning sensation occasionally on my chest. Gonna call in the morning and beg them to see me for a biopsy.
